title: Canada's Provinces and people
brief_description: Canada, a country with a great variety of landforms and people of many ethnic backgrounds, is emerging as a leader in world trade and has become one of the most prosperous nations of the world. Emphasises the relation of Canada’s natural resources to the lives of the people. Individual regions are mapped with their primary industries.
